Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 1 Meaning: All praise and thanks is for Allah The Master of the day of judgment
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 2 Meaning: The extremely loving and caring right now, the always loving and caring
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 3 Meaning: The Master of the day of judgment
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 4 Meaning: You alone we worship and You alone we ask for help
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 5 Meaning: Guide us to the upright straight path
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 6 Meaning: The path of those whom You have favored
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 7 Meaning: But not the path of those who earn wrath nor those who are lost
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 2: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًۭى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 2 Meaning: That is the book. No Doubt! In it is a guidance for the cautious
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 3: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 3 Meaning: Those who believe in the unseen, establish salah, and only in what We have provided them, they spend
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 4: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 4 Meaning: And those who believe in whatever was ssent to you and whatever was sent from much before you and they are convinced about the afterlife
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 5: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًۭى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 5 Meaning: Those people are committed to guidance from their Master and those people are the reapers of success
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 6: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 6 Meaning: Certainly those who disbelieve it is the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them they will never believe
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 7: خَتَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ غِشَـٰوَةٌۭ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 7 Meaning: Allah has completely sealed their hearts and their hearing and even over their eyes is a covering and for them is a great punishment
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 8: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 8 Meaning: And from among the people there is someone who say we believe in Allah and even in the last day. No! They are not believers at all
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 9: يُخَـٰدِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَمَا يَخْدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 9 Meaning: They try to deceive Allah and the believers. They do not deceive anyone except themselves. They have no realization at all.
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 10: فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ ١٠
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 10 Meaning: There is a disease in their hearts. Then Allah has increased them in sickness.  They will have a constantly painful punishment because they habitually used to lie.
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 11: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 11 Meaning: And when it is said to then do not cause corruption in the land they say we are only peacemakers
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 12: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْسِدُونَ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 12 Meaning: Listen up! It is they who are the cause of corruption and they have no realization at all
